p: The frequencies of KIR3DL2 and HLA-A11/A3 were calculated first. Since the interaction of KIR2DS4 and KIR2DS2 with HLA-A11 has been demonstrated, their combinations have also been calculated [ 14, 29]. The frequencies of KIR3DL2+A11/A3 and KIR2DS4+A11/A3 were from 0.417 to 0.879, while the frequencies of KIR2DS2+A11 were lower, with frequencies from 0.038 to 0.299 ( Table 4). In Nu, the frequency of KIR2DS2+A11 was only 0.038, though HLA-A*11:01 was predominant, with a frequency of 0.411( Table 4).
